- Location: Basement concrete slab floor; floor drain visible in upper left.
- Materials: Concrete slab; likely wearing/peeling seal coat or epoxy over concrete.
- Condition: Large irregular patches of discoloration; surface appears damp/worn around patches.
- Potential issues: Possible moisture intrusion or past water exposure causing coating degradation.
- Recommendations: Perform moisture test/hygrometer; repair or recoat with a proper moisture barrier; ensure proper drainage and dryness around the drain.
